text: wtra-ayha alnby- almalayikat mhytyn bersh alrhmn, ynzhwn rabihim ean kl ma la ylyq bh, waqadaa allah subhanah wteala bayn alkhlayq bialhaqi waledl, faskn 'ahl al'iiman aljnt, wa'ahl alkufr alnar, wqyl: alhamd lilah rabi alealamin ealaa ma qadaa bih bayn 'ahl aljanat wa'ahl alnar, hamd fadal w'ihsan, whamd eadl whkmt
